originalText.text: After having a bad experience with cataract surgery, I went to Dr. Harvey Rosenblum.  He is brillant , patient doctor.  I immediatley felt comfortable and had all my concerns answered.  The office on Madison Avenue is clean and staff very friendly.  I highly recommend him.  J. Coppola

text.text: After having a bad experience with cataract surgery, I went to Dr. Harvey Rosenblum.  He is brillant , patient doctor.  I immediatley felt comfortable and had all my concerns answered.  The office on Madison Avenue is clean and staff very friendly.  I highly recommend him.  J. Coppola

originalText.text: I went to see Dr. Rosenblume on 5/31/2018,  It was for something urgent with my vision and I did not have a appointment . I was so pleasantly received by Mrs. Rosenblume who happened to be there. I was taken in immediately by a lady technician who run all the necessary exams on a state of the art equipments. While examining, she was explaining to me every step , assuring and comforting me . Then I saw Dr.Rosenblume who did a thorough exam to the eyes, I received the necessary treatment and I felt very safe. Truly, he is the only one I trust with my eyes!
